title: New York news
content:
any new yorkers here?!  
Does anyone know a good newsblog for New York City.  
I don't mind a little design, art, and music too... not just plain news, if y'know what I mean?!

I am looking for something like this:  
 [www.thelocal.de](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131011749/http:/www.thelocal.de/ "www.thelocal.de")
author: rosmedia

comments.content:
[http://www.nytimes.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131011749/http:/www.nytimes.com/ "http://www.nytimes.com/")

haha, the online version. You have the news, and the arts section.

thanx  
well.. I knew nytimes. : )

but today I found this:

[http://wirednewyork.com/forum/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131011749/http:/wirednewyork.com/forum/ "http://wirednewyork.com/forum/")  
 [http://wirednewyork.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100131011749/http:/wirednewyork.com/ "http://wirednewyork.com/")

the old photos & videos section is neat
